tasks.title: Optimize Hero Section Performance and SEO
tasks.description: Implement image preloading for hero background and optimize loading performance for better LCP scores
tasks.details: Add preload links for main_background.jpeg in public/index.html. Implement lazy loading for hero section content. Add proper meta tags for SEO including Open Graph and Twitter cards. Optimize font loading with font-display: swap. Add structured data markup for LocalBusiness schema.
tasks.testStrategy: Use Lighthouse to verify LCP improvement (target <2.5s). Test on different network conditions. Verify meta tags with social media debuggers.

tasks.title: Enhance Navigation Accessibility and UX
tasks.description: Improve keyboard navigation, focus management, and mobile dropdown functionality for better accessibility compliance
tasks.details: Add proper ARIA labels and roles to navigation elements. Implement keyboard navigation for dropdown menus. Fix focus trapping in mobile menu. Add skip-to-content link. Ensure color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards. Implement proper focus indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: Test keyboard-only navigation through all menu items. Use screen reader testing. Run axe-core accessibility audit. Verify color contrast with WebAIM tools.

tasks.title: Implement Error Boundaries and Loading States
tasks.description: Add React error boundaries and improve loading states throughout the application for better user experience
tasks.details: Create ErrorBoundary component with graceful error handling. Add loading skeletons for video content and page transitions. Implement retry mechanisms for YouTube API failures. Add toast notifications for user actions like address copying.
tasks.testStrategy: Simulate API failures and network errors. Test error recovery flows. Verify loading states appear during slow network conditions.

tasks.title: Optimize YouTube API Integration
tasks.description: Improve YouTube API error handling, caching, and implement rate limiting to handle quota restrictions
tasks.details: Implement localStorage caching for YouTube API responses with TTL. Add retry logic with exponential backoff. Create API quota monitoring. Improve dummy data fallback UX with better messaging. Add video thumbnail optimization.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API quota exhaustion scenarios. Verify caching works correctly. Test offline behavior. Monitor API call frequency and optimization.

tasks.title: Enhance Sermon Page Filtering and UX
tasks.description: Improve sermon page with advanced filtering, search functionality, and better video player integration
tasks.details: Add search functionality for sermon titles. Implement date range filtering. Add sermon series organization. Improve video player with custom controls and quality selection. Add sermon transcript display capability. Implement infinite scroll for large video lists.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering combinations and search accuracy. Verify video player functionality across devices. Test performance with large video lists.

tasks.title: Complete Location Page with Interactive Features
tasks.description: Enhance location page with better map integration, directions, and transportation information
tasks.details: Improve Kakao Map integration with custom markers and info windows. Add directions API integration. Create detailed public transportation guides. Add parking information and church facility details. Implement address copying with user feedback.
tasks.testStrategy: Test map loading and interaction on various devices. Verify directions accuracy. Test address copying functionality.

tasks.title: Implement Advanced Media Gallery Features
tasks.description: Enhance media page with better video organization, filtering, and social media integration
tasks.details: Add video categories and tags system. Implement advanced filtering for video types (sermons, events, shorts). Add social sharing buttons. Create video playlists functionality. Add Instagram feed integration placeholder. Implement video favorites system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering and categorization. Verify social sharing links. Test video playlist functionality across devices.

tasks.title: Add Progressive Web App Features
tasks.description: Implement PWA capabilities including offline support, push notifications, and app-like experience
tasks.details: Create service worker for offline caching. Add web app manifest for installation. Implement push notifications for new sermons. Add offline page with cached content. Create app icons and splash screens. Add update notification system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test offline functionality and caching. Verify PWA installation process. Test push notifications across devices.

tasks.title: Optimize Performance and Bundle Size
tasks.description: Implement code splitting, lazy loading, and other performance optimizations to achieve target Lighthouse scores
tasks.details: Implement route-based code splitting. Add component lazy loading. Optimize images with WebP format and responsive images. Minimize bundle size with tree shaking. Add compression for static assets. Implement resource hints for critical resources.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Lighthouse performance audits (target 80+ score). Analyze bundle size with webpack-bundle-analyzer. Test loading performance on 3G networks.

tasks.title: Implement Analytics and Monitoring
tasks.description: Add comprehensive analytics, error tracking, and performance monitoring for website insights
tasks.details: Integrate Google Analytics 4 with custom events. Add video engagement tracking. Implement error tracking with Sentry. Create performance monitoring dashboard. Add user behavior analytics for UX improvements. Track sermon engagement metrics.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify event tracking accuracy. Test error reporting functionality. Monitor performance metrics collection.

tasks.title: Enhance Visual Design and Animations
tasks.description: Refine visual design elements, improve animations, and ensure consistent branding throughout the site
tasks.details: Refine animation timing and easing for better UX. Add micro-interactions for user feedback. Improve loading animations and transitions. Ensure consistent spacing and typography. Add dark/light theme toggle option. Create custom illustrations or graphics.
tasks.testStrategy: Test animations on various devices and browsers. Verify reduced motion accessibility preference. Check visual consistency across all pages.

tasks.title: Final Testing and Launch Preparation
tasks.description: Comprehensive testing across devices, browsers, and network conditions before production deployment
tasks.details: Perform cross-browser testing (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge). Test responsive design on various screen sizes. Conduct accessibility audit with screen readers. Test API integrations and error scenarios. Verify SEO optimizations and meta tags. Run security audit and performance tests.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive test matrix for devices/browsers. Perform manual and automated accessibility testing. Run full Lighthouse audit suite. Test all user journeys and error cases.
